import { Link, useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import { useForm } from "../hooks/useForm"; import { LockClosedIcon } from "@heroicons/react/solid"; import axios from "axios"; const Register = () => { const username = useForm("username"); const email = useForm("email"); const password = useForm("password"); const history = useHistory(); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); axios .post("/api/auth/register", { username: username.value, email: email.value, password: password.value, }) .then((res) => res.data) .then(() => history.push("/login")); }; return (
